panels.description: Some tables exist of different panels shown above each other. If that is the case return a comma separated string with short panel IDs e.g. 'A,B,C' if it has a panel A, panel B and panel C. If no separate panels are marked just return null.

num_panels.description: The number of explicit panels in the table. If the table does not distinguish panels, write 0.

shows_descriptive.description: true if the table shows descriptive statistics

is_balancing_table.description: true if the table is a balancing table that shows whether certain characteristics are similarily distributed between control and treatment groups.

shows_regression.description: true if results of one or several regressions are shown in the table.

shows_did.description: true if results of a difference-in-difference regression are shown in the table.

shows_rdd.description: true if results of regression discontinuity design are shown in the table.

shows_iv_results.description: true if results of an instrumental variable regression are shown in the table

shows_iv_first_stage.description: true if results of a first stage instrumental variable regression are shown in the table.

shows_placebo_test.description: true if results of a placebo test are shown in the table

num_regression.description: The results of how many separate regressions are shown in the table?

uses_panel_data.description: true if the data set underlying the table is a panel data set.

short_descr.description: A short description of what is shown in the table.
